title: why does riot purposely rig ranked
body: every single time i manage to get promoted all my matches are  guaranteed losses until im demoted again, seriously this has happen for the past idk 4 months probaly forever, ive been promoted 8 times about, and after every time i get promoted all my next are losses no matter what until im demoted again, i lose 6 in a row and get demoted 4 out of those 6 matches someone goes afk purposely for no reason, but riot never does anything about,

replies.body: It could be that you're just playing with players your skill level, and hence when you get any higher, you're versing players that are more skilled than you and hence have a higher chance of losing that match.
